name: Potata
description:
Adventure platformer about Potata's travel in fairy forest. Finding yourself and saving the world on the way. Where your story takes you? Immerse yourself in an atmosphere of peace and natural tranquility. Reveal all secrets and hidden treasures and don't forget to save the world.


*Wonderful world
*Amazing puzzles
*Several ways of passing a locations
*Puzzles with several solutions
*Funny characters
*Relax gameplay
